website_summaries.verdict: A dirt cheap price tag and ultimate convenience makes the Mad Catz USB Data/Charge Cable a must-have PSP accessory.
pros: Allows you to charge your PSP and transfer files via USB simultaneously
can be used to charge many cell phones and PDAs, as well
works with standard iPod AC adapters
cons: Eight-foot cable is overkill for the average user
you need to supply the power source

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, worked perfectly with my PSP 3001, just to reduce my backpack weight, now i do not need the charger, just this cable and my laptop to transfer files and charge my PSP. A must have for PSP owners.
customer_reviews.author: FROILAN MORALES

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I wasn't sure if PSP accepted normal USB cables. This thing doesn't work, and it's definitely not user error at work here, given the fact that I used a regular mini-USB cable from a camera I own with my PSP immediately afterwards, having no problems getting my PC to detect my PSP. I still couldn't do the transfer, because the Media Go software (which has no effect on this review, FYI) is freaking terrible. I'd only suggest using a cable if you're going to manually transfer content through your PC operating system's file browser. Even then, don't purchase this cable. Just use a regular mini-USB cable. You probably already have one lying around.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bender

customer_reviews.title: Powers my psp from external source!
customer_reviews.text: After giving up on replacing my psp 3000 battery with an OEM battery, I decide to buy this cable to power my psp using an 10,000mAh portable battery. Works wonders and I'm really happy! Can go a week without needing a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ryza

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, great product. I always felt left out that every other PSP model can charge via USB but the flagship model, but now I can and while transferring files too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Tarmann

customer_reviews.title: Great cable option.
customer_reviews.text: This is your normal run of the mill cable. I haven't had any issues and it connects and charges without issue. No issues with the cable length.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement cables!
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly. All three plugs seem to do their job. And best yet, this is this cheaper than just a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Thew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement cable for my PSP when my dog decided it liked the taste of the original one... Works perfect and exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: michael webb

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cable is pretty good, and finally i found a cable that also recharges the psp, others dont really do so.
customer_reviews.author: Will Bernado

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: warning, will not charge if your PSP battery is totally drained
customer_reviews.author: DenMark

customer_reviews.title: Good solid cable
customer_reviews.text: It is just as described, a good solid cable that works fine, nothing exceptional about it, but then again, it is just a USB cable!
customer_reviews.author: Danfar

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I found this wire is very useful because it save me trouble carrying the original power cord. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Mancipe

customer_reviews.title: Great cable.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a game, so I am giving it 1 star for game fun-ness. But its a great data cable. Works like a charm. Its cheaper at the Sony store though, so if you have one in your neighborhood, grab it. Bought one for $2.03 for my PSP go, and it came with a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A.

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: wow, worked only for one day, the next day it magically stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: After losing my (crappy) PSP charger, I was glad to find this. First off, it's cheaper than the most trust-able PSP wall charger (which doesn't even have great reviews) and doubles as a data cable. For the first time in months, I've actually fully charged my PSP. The charging cable is a lifesaver when you can't turn the PSP on to enable USB charging. TIP FOR THOSE EXPERIENCING DRIVER ERRORS WITH WINDOWS ON A DESKTOP: Try plugging the cord into the back of the computer rather than one of the front/top USB ports. Worked like a charm for me.
customer_reviews.author: TheHarpyEagle

customer_reviews.title: Good cable overall.
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice cable, it included the Go as one of the plug ins. I have noticed a quirk with the Go when trying to charge it. It need the PSP AC adaptor. A simple USB outlet adaptor will not suffice.
customer_reviews.author: John Quigley III

customer_reviews.title: Slightly different from pictures
customer_reviews.text: This works as well as intended for my PSP 3001, but contrast to the main pictures of just the data and power cable, there's also one more head to connect to the PSP GO (another customer has since posted a picture of it). This is a little annoying as there's one extra cord just useless and dangling when you're using this. As it is however, I purchased this over others due to research of how other customers have had issues with cheaper ebay or amazon alternatives and this came recommended by many sources. Have had no trouble so far and thankfully, I also purchasedso charging has been reduced to only once or twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lam

customer_reviews.title: works perfect on my psp 3000
customer_reviews.text: Was worried at the beginning since the description wasn't exactly about the Psp 3000 model. So don't worry if you are looking for a usb and charger in one for your PSP 3000 / Slim / Go. Works just as it says.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Pérez Umaña

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected transferring files is a snap and the ability to charge the PSP thru USB is invaluable when you are traveling and only have your laptop as a power source
customer_reviews.author: I. Dsouza

customer_reviews.title: Does not deliver enough power.
customer_reviews.text: This does not deliver enough current to charge my PSP3000. The charging light comes on, the current is too low.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer123

customer_reviews.title: short
customer_reviews.text: this cord was not 8ft long. when i pulled it out it was maybe 2-3 ft.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Kehrer

customer_reviews.title: This game is great-my family enjoy everytime we can.
customer_reviews.text: This company is excellent. The product is a great choice you can use with internet and download pictures, music and more games.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rivera Rios

product_meta.title: PSP Slim/Go USB Data and Power Cable
product_meta.description: Mad Catz 8 feet USB/Power Cable for PSP will allow you to power up your PSP/PSP Go through your computer's USB port and help transfer files to and from your PSP/PSP Go. Cable is long enough, perfect for desktops that are kept under the tables. Mad Catz promises you innovative, quality products for all your gaming needs.
feature_bullets: Transfer files to your PSP, PSP Slim and PSP Go

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars26 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
